com.nutiteq.vectorlayers
Class BillBoardLayer<T extends BillBoard>

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.layers.Layer
      com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.VectorLayer<T>
          com.nutiteq.vectorlayers.BillBoardLayer<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MarkerLayer, TextLayer
public class BillBoardLayer<T extends BillBoard>
extends VectorLayer<T>

Layer for all billboard elements (markers, texts). This class can not be directly instantiated, use derived TextLayer or MarkerLayer instead.

Method Detail

isZOrdered

public boolean isZOrdered()
Get the Z ordering state for this layer.

Returns:
current Z ordering state. True if enabled (default).

setZOrdered

public void setZOrdered(boolean zOrdered)
Set the Z ordering state for this layer. When enabled, elements are ordered based on distance from the camera (using camera relative Z-coordinate) and layer ordering is not preserved. This forces the layer to be in "3D" mode. When disabled, elements are ordered as normal elements (points, lines, polygons), this is the preferred mode for normal 2D views as overlapping elements cause less visual artifacts.

Parameters:
zOrdered - new Z ordering state. Default is enabled (true).
